name: GARDEN OF EDEN
description:
Game Introduction




In 《伊甸园GARDEN OF EDEN》, you will lead an army to seek survival at sea.
The first problem faced by players as commanders is how to survive.

Unique settings




Unlike other settlement games, the survival location of 'Garden of Eden of EDEN' is chosen at sea.
The way in which most resources are obtained is brand new, and the difficulty will also increase significantly.

Rich entertainment




To meet basic survival needs, it is also necessary to plan some entertainment facilities so that everyone has the opportunity to relax

Weather System




Bad weather is the second difficulty, and the extreme weather that occurs in the game varies according to the season, resulting in unique negative impacts
If your strategy is clever enough, disasters will also be beneficial

A fierce battle




When your wealth accumulates to a certain extent, there will be no shortage of bandits. Build powerful weapons and equipment to repel them
